name: Sillito.github.io
body:
# v0.9 studio

We are a company focused on intense face-to-face learning
in Calgary. Our courses are for teams that want to quickly get
started making software on a new platform, or just 
explore new ways to build software.

Developing great software starts with great people. 
People that deeply understand their languages, frameworks 
and tools. But also people that
understand the best ideas from other frameworks and 
the field of computer science generally.

Our _getting started_ courses help participants 
develop their 
first a application in a new language or framework. At the same
time the fundamental principles of the technology will be covered
for a strong foundation
for continued learning. Our hands on courses include:

* **Getting started with Ruby on Rails.** 
Three days on the basics of the Ruby programming language and
the Ruby on Rails web framework. By the end of the course you'll
have developed your first Rails application and learned the
key patterns and conventions at the heart of the framework.

* **Getting started with iOS programming.**
Four intense days on the fundamentals of the Objective-C
programming language along with the core tools and frameworks
needed for developing iPhone and iPad applications. The course
will cover the object-oriented design patterns at the heart of
the iOS frameworks so you'll understand how and why 
things work.

* **Getting started with JavaScript and Node.js.**
Two intense days on the fundamentals
of developing server software, including web applications, with
Node.js. By the end of the course you'll deeply understand Node's 
nonblocking, evented execution model.

### Get in touch

If you're in Calgary
and interested in scheduling a course for your team, 
or just want to talk about learning and training at your 
organization send me an email at
[sillito@gmail.com](mailto:sillito@gmail.com).
